channel.title: chocolatey on TOUNO.io
channel.description: Recent content in chocolatey on TOUNO.io

item.title: Chocolatey recommend software for developer
item.description: Install chocolatey with cmd as administrator and run command below. @"%SystemRoot%\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -NoProfile -InputFormat None -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://chocolatey.org/install.ps1'))" && SET "PATH=%PATH%;%ALLUSERSPROFILE%\chocolatey\bin" exit terminal and run cmd as administrator again @echo off choco feature enable -n allowGlobalConfirmation choco install virtualbox --version=6.0.14 choco install git.install --params "/NoGuiHereIntegratio /NoShellHereIntegration /NoShellIntegration" --force # Tool Recommand choco install aegisub azure-cli cmder curl deno ^ ffmpeg flutter forticlientvpn github-desktop golang googlechrome ^ hugo k9s kubeless kubernetes-cli kubernetes-helm kubernetes-kompose ^ microsoft-teams mkvtoolnix mpc-hc mremoteng ngrok.
